subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: Which of the following kisan andolan was led by Kanhaiyalal Sethia?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सा किसान आंदोलन कन्हैयालाल सेठिया द्वारा नेतृत्व किया गया था?
explanation_en: The Bijolia Movement was led by Kanhaiyalal Sethia.
explanation_hi: बिजोलिया आंदोलन का नेतृत्व कन्हैयालाल सेठिया ने किया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: In which year did the Bijolia Movement start?
question_hi: बिजोलिया आंदोलन किस वर्ष में शुरू हुआ था?
explanation_hi: बिजोलिया आंदोलन 1907 में शुरू हुआ था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: The Bijolia Movement was a peasant movement in which district?
question_hi: बिजोलिया आंदोलन किस जिले में एक किसान आंदोलन था?
explanation_en: The Bijolia Movement was a peasant movement in Chittorgarh district.
explanation_hi: बिजोलिया आंदोलन चित्तौड़गढ़ जिले में एक किसान आंदोलन था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: Who was the leader of the Bengu Movement?
question_hi: बेंगू आंदोलन के नेता कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rao Bhojraj was the leader of the Bengu Movement.
explanation_hi: राव भूजराज बेंगू आंदोलन के नेता थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: The Bengu Movement took place in which district?
question_hi: बेंगू आंदोलन किस जिले में हुआ था?
explanation_en: The Bengu Movement took place in Alwar district.
explanation_hi: बेंगू आंदोलन अलवर जिले में हुआ था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: The kisan andolan which took place in 1923 was
explanation_en: The Mandi Movement took place in 1923.

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: The kisan andolan which was led by Jawaharlal Nehru was
question_hi: जवाहरलाल नेहरू द्वारा नेतृत्व किया गया किसान आंदोलन था
explanation_en: The Kisan Satyagraha was led by Jawaharlal Nehru.
explanation_hi: किसान सत्याग्रह का नेतृत्व जवाहरलाल नेहरू ने किया था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
explanation_en: The Bijolia Movement was against high land revenue.
explanation_hi: बिजोलिया आंदोलन उच्च भूमि राजस्व के खिलाफ था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: The leader of the Bijolia Movement was
explanation_en: Kanhaiyalal Sethia was the leader of the Bijolia Movement.
explanation_hi: कन्हैयालाल सेठिया बिजोलिया आंदोलन के नेता थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan mein Kisan Andolan: Bijolia, Bengu aur Anya
question_en: The Bengu Movement was a reaction against
question_hi: बेंगू आंदोलन किसके खिलाफ एक प्रतिक्रिया थी?
explanation_en: The Bengu Movement was a reaction against high land revenue.
explanation_hi: बेंगू आंदोलन उच्च भूमि राजस्व के खिलाफ एक प्रतिक्रिया थी।
